#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int dig(int n)
{
    int sum=0;
    while(n>0)
    {
        ++sum;
        n/=10;
    }
return sum;
}
#define max(a,b) a>b?a:b
main()
{
int a,b;
start:
cin>>a>>b;
while(a!=0 && b!=0)
{
    int x=max(dig(a),dig(b));
    int m[x],n[x];
    int i;
    for(i=0;i<x;++i)
    {
        m[i]=a%10;
        a/=10;
    }
    for(i=0;i<x;++i)
    {
        n[i]=b%10;
        b/=10;
    }
    int sum=0;
    for(i=0;i<x;++i)
    {
        if(m[i]+n[i]>9)
        {
            ++sum;
            ++m[i];
        }
    }
if(sum==0)
    cout<<"No carry operation.\n";
else if (sum==1)
    cout<<sum<<" carry operation.\n";
else
    cout<<sum<<" carry operations.\n";
goto start;
}
return 0;
}
